Package de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics

Anything that relates to the graphical user interface of Siafu is contained in this package.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Overlayable
    Classes implementing this interface contain a bidimensional array that can be drawn on top of the background map, and has its same dimensions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutShell
    A shell to showing the credits for Siafu.
    ColorTools
    An utility class to parse colors back and forth from String form to RGB.
    ConfigShell
    A shell to change the configuration of Siafu.
    ContextMenuListener
    This menu pops up upon right clicking on the canvas, and allows the user to operate with the entities near the clicked point.
    GUI
    The GUI class implements the simulator Graphical User Interface.
    LoadingComposite  
    MainMenu
    The menu on the top bar of the simulator, which provides, among others, simulation loading control and siafu configuration.
    Markers
    Instances of this class encapsulate the marks in the simulator.
    Painter
    This class handles the actual drawing on the simulation's canvas for most of the simulator's graphics.
    Sprite
    A sprite is an object that contains the images for an Agent simulation, as he faces each possible direction.
    StandbyComposite  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Markers.Type
    This class represents the types of tracks available in the simulator.

Package de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics Description

Anything that relates to the graphical user interface of Siafu is contained in this package.
